Container.Name: flood-ui
Container.Overview:
A web UI for rTorrent with a Node.js backend and React frontend for Unraid. Converted By Community Applications Always verify this template (and values) against the dockerhub support page for the container.
This does not contain rTorrent. Use one of the other recommended rTorrent docker containers. This just acts as a UI replacement if there are more torrents than ruTorrent can handle.
